cli.explorer
Class FileExplorer

java.lang.Object
  cli.explorer.FileExplorer

public final class FileExplorer
extends Object

Explore a directory and its sub-directories and apply {link FileProcedure. You can also use wildcard pattern to consider only a subset of files.

Since:
5 nov. 2009 version 2.1.1
Version:
2.1.1
Author:
Arnaud Malapert

Method Detail

explore

public static void explore(FileProcedure proc,
                           File file,
                           String... wildcards)

explore

public static boolean explore(FileProcedure proc,
                              File file,
                              List<String> wildcards)
Explore recursivly a directory and apply a procedure to each valid file.

Parameters:
proc - the procedure to apply
file - the directory or a readable file
wildcards - wildcard patterns which filter filenames in the directories.
Returns:
true if it succeeds, false if it failed and exploration has been interrupted.

main

public static void main(String[] args)
